data.title: Garden Finance co-founder confirmed a loss of approximately $11 million due to the attack, but user funds were not affected.
data.description: According to a post on the X platform by Garden Finance co-founder Jaz Gulati, the project suffered a loss of approximately $11 million due to an attack on its solver. The team is currently investigating and tracking the incident with security partners. Jaz Gulati emphasized that user funds were unaffected, the incident only involved a single solver, and had no impact on the protocol's operation or overall security.

data.title: ether.fi: TVL surpasses $11.5 billion, Q3 fee revenue reaches $77 million.
data.description: Ether.Fi, a liquidity staking infrastructure, released quarterly data on its X platform, disclosing that its total value locked (TVL) reached $11.51 billion, a 78% increase quarter-over-quarter; third-quarter fee revenue reached $77 million, an 85% increase quarter-over-quarter; and third-quarter protocol revenue reached $16.9 million, a 78% increase quarter-over-quarter. In addition, its monthly active users have approached 30,000.

data.description:

data.title: The two whales profited over $4 million from their long positions in ZEC, but still have an overall unrealized loss of approximately $5 million.
data.description: According to OnchainLens monitoring, as ZEC's market capitalization surpassed XMR, two whales holding positions on HyperLiquid have profited significantly from their long positions. The newly created address 0x519c holds a 5x long position in ZEC, currently showing a floating profit of approximately $2.2 million; address 0x549e also holds a 5x long position in ZEC, with a floating profit of approximately $1.8 million, and simultaneously holds a 10x long position in HYPE, with a total floating profit of approximately $2.3 million. However, their overall accounts are still in a state of floating loss exceeding $5 million.

data.title: Bitcoin Market Shows Increasing Institutional Dominance
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr has noted a significant shift in Bitcoin trading dynamics. The proportion of retail trades, specifically those in the $0–$1000 range, has decreased from 1.8% in 2021 to 0.48% currently, indicating a growing dominance of larger participants in the overall trading volume.

As of October 2025, the daily average activity of retail trades remains stable at $108 million, which is notably lower than the historical peak of $132 million to $150 million. This suggests a change in market structure and a decline in speculative activities among smaller participants.

The number of daily transactions within the $0–$1000 range is approximately 700,000, close to the historical average, but the average transaction size has decreased compared to previous cycles. This further highlights the more conservative behavior of retail traders.

The Bitcoin market is exhibiting clear signs of institutionalization. Over the past four years, the proportion of retail trades has significantly declined, indicating a shift in market control towards large institutions. The influence of small speculators on overall market trends is diminishing. The current stability of retail activity at $108 million daily represents a new benchmark in a mature, institutionalized market, where the speculative fervor of small investors is giving way to more robust accumulation strategies.

data.title: Web3 funding totaled $3.877 billion in October, the second-highest amount ever.
data.description: According to DefiLlama data, total funding for the Web3 industry reached $3.877 billion in October 2025, marking the second-highest level in history, second only to the peak of $7 billion in November 2021. The majority of this month's funding was contributed by Polymarket, Tempo, and Kalshi, which raised approximately $2 billion, $500 million, and $300 million respectively, accounting for over 70% of the total funding.

data.title: A whale opened a 2x short position in ZEC, with a position value of approximately $1.41 million.
data.description: According to Lookonchain monitoring, in the past 3 hours, the whale address 0xC385 deposited $3 million USDC into HyperLiquid and opened a 2x short position of 3,230 ZEC, with a current holding value of approximately $1.41 million.
